name: Bot Swap
description:
Players take control of buddybot, a lost little robot whos down on his luck.  use other machines to gain new abilities and help buddybot on his quest

controls:

Move: WASD

interact: E

fly: spacebar (after you get the drone)

credits:

Environment Artist: Michael Pacheco

character artist: Ben Amos

Animator: Darren Walker

Programmer:  Ryan Buehler

Audio: Noah
